txt.en:
Listen here, Ailgar. I care not for your well-being or for Rúvaran's, but Covairë is dear to me and I would not have her hurt. Remember what happened to Govard?

We should not have brought this artifact from Barad Gúlaran, no matter the importance of Rúvaran's purpose. What cares he for the rest of us?

I have done what Magith asked of me. Now you do your part, and see that Covairë bears the relic for no longer than necessary.

Remember Govard.

Lógrath
